item.title: Turing machines
item.description: Table of Contents Description Tape TODO Describe Multi tape turing machines here Head Machine state Deterministic vs non deterministic Formal definition With own words added for understanding Example printing 110 Simple programm Sources Description The turing machine model is not a real machine but rather a model which describes how a Computer would solve a formalized problem. It describes which requirements the algorithm has to ensure the turing machine can correctly execute.
